title: Need a New Forum Report Option: "Report for Trolling"
body:
There are plenty of trolls on the forums that get to continue doing it because there is no repercussion. They sit just on the edge of breaking the rules so they can't be reported. They are pretty obvious, so stacking up Trolling reports from different people could flag them to get looked at by a moderator for bans. Please add this so they stay in GD or  go away entirely.

Edit: I'd like to thank the troll who arrived specifically to prove the necessity of this. Thank you, you've been a huge help.

replies.body:
Doesn't most trolling fall under offensive, spam, or harassment anyway?

Or if the troll is starting their own threads, incorrect board usually suffices if they're not posting an actual topic.

Also, considering how obvious this guy is being, you could report him for harassment for feeling the need to respond to everyone who dared to comment on this thread. At least half of his posts are coherent, he did make a good point in his own original comment, but he's laying it on a bit thick with the mass commenting.
